entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 3:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: NW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
